location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Captain Charles Gilmore, Commander of the HCC Teignmouth

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The letter has suffered from pest damage, which has partially obscured the opening body of the letter on f. 89v. As a result, the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter contains instructions to deliver a packet to Captain John Ferrier, Commander of the British squadron off Muscat. It also requests that he should assist the HCC Princess Augustaif the opportunity presents itself.
